author: ReverendLondo

text: This was such a sweet game.  Awesome characters, fun battles, compelling story, fishing.  I also liked that it had little secret areas you could visit and for some reason I loved the scenery.  This set the bar high for RPGs even if people didn't realize it.  Also, I have this song on my iPod and nothing is sweeter than getting this relaxing tune from time to time.

text:
The first RPG that made me want to get devoted to it, music is great, story is great and it's an awesome game! Can't even be described! 

And memorable moments like going into town to just listen to the wonderful tunes that plays in the game is the best... The music didn't get you dreaded to return to a town just because the story forced you too, 
Now that's motivation!
